mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{pno} AND SALES_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT P JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (P.PRODUCT_NO=A.REF_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO=P.USER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY C ON (P.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{pno} AND P.SALES_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(PRODUCT_NO, USER_NO, CATEGORY_NO, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_PRICE) VALUES (SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{categoryNo}, #{productTitle}, #{productContent}, #{productPrice})
mapper.delete: UPDATE PRODUCT SET SALES_STATUS= 'N' WHERE SALES_STATUS = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_NO = #{pno}
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET SALES_STATUS = 'N' WHERE SALES_STATUS = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
